character.statement: Here are the trophies of my greatest hunts.
This African rhino nearly gored me!
The silverback gorilla is a wily foe indeed, but I got the best of him!
Of course, that was nothing compared to my greatest triumph of all.
Oh yes -- there's no challenge like finding good help!
Please meet my man, Winston. A more faithful servant you will never find.
Forgive me a bit of vainglory. This bust of me contains a perfect replica of my voice saying the Van Buren family rallying cry!
More shoddy work by my taxidermist. I should have *his* head, ha ha!
Winston, please inform the chef that we are ready for supper, and then prepare our guest's quarters for the night.
As for you, dear friend, join me for dinner in the banquet room, and don't tarry!
Let's not rush the tour!
I said, DON'T tarry!
No tomfoolery in the trophy room!
Quite droll, sir.
Charmed.
Charmed.
At once, m'lord.
I'd better leave it for now.
You don't mean...!
Tally-ho!
